column1: # New categories found under the following sections in Mapsource.
# Taken out because it looks better simply as polyline
# 0x4a reserved for outer line around the map, 0x4b only to be used in typfile as background colour definition
#0x56 and above empty, however how far can one go? 0x5f should still be possible
# Cycleroutes - as there is no draworder for Polylines, if one line is tagged with two definitions, the one higher up in the list will be used (not the one with the lower 0xNUMBER)
# Attention: Not yet in Typfile 0x49 - will not show in Mapsource
# 0x20-0x25 are reserved for elevation and depth (=underwater) contourlines
# In most countries bus and taxiways may be used by cyclists, taxiway should be used for lanes for aeroplanes, but maybe someone misuses it for cabs and taxis.
